= Project Milestones =

The following list of milestones and their associated dates will be observed for the duration of development. 


= Milestone Listing =

*M1* - Foundation feature set complete. This includes DB2, JDBC, and the DataModel

*M2* - Alpha. Core feature set complete. This includes the View and Controller.

*M3* - Stable. Debugged and ready for Part 1 presentation.

*M4* - Beta. Feature complete / Part 2 integration complete.

*M5* - ZBR. Program is complete, functional, robust, and ready to be submitted.
